title: Stories about Suffering
main_text:
As my sufferings mounted I soon realized that there were two ways in which I could respond to my situation -- either to react with bitterness or seek to transform the suffering into a creative force. I decided to follow the latter course.‚Äù Martin Luther King Jr.
